analysis.key_quote: The reclassification of the career civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications as Schedule F has the potential to politicize the NIH, reduce public trust in Federally-funded science, and reduce our ability to identify future cures for diseases that impact all Americans, regardless of political ideology.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concerns about the potential for politicization of the NIH and its impact on public trust in science, which aligns with opposition to the proposed rule.
